extension.name: OSB Table Plugin
extension.author: Ossolution Team
extension.description: This plugin is used to display booking table within a Joomla article. The code format is: {osbtable sid:Service_ID|eid:Employee_ID|cid:Category_ID|vid:Venue_ID}. For example: {osbtable sid:1|eid:2|cid:3|vid:4} or {osbtable sid:1|eid:2|cid:3} or {osbtable sid:1|eid:2} or {osbtable sid:1} ..etc
